sentences.en: 57 per cent complained of work overload.
Be careful not to overload the washing machine.
sentences.cn: 注意别让洗衣机负荷过重。

sentences.en: Could you overload the engines and blow up the ship?
sentences.cn: 你能不能让引擎过载烧掉这艘飞船?

sentences.en: Don't overload the boat or it will sink.
Don't overload the electrical system by using too many machines at once.
sentences.cn: 不要同时使用许多机器使供电系统超量负载.

sentences.en: Don't overload your lecture with details that do not bear on the topic under discussion.
sentences.cn: 讲课时不要过多地谈与本题无关的细节.

sentences.en: Large meals overload the digestive system.
sentences.cn: 吃得太饱会加重消化系统的负担。
千万不要使电源插座过载。

sentences.en: No more than 500 milliliters per bottle are used on any child to avoid accidental overload.
sentences.cn: 任何年令组每次瓶内都不要超过500毫升,以防超负荷所引起的意外.

sentences.en: Not to mention the physical effects of neural or endocrine overload.
sentences.cn: 更不用说神经和内分沁超负荷对身体的影响了.

sentences.en: The air guards the catalytic converter from overload and possible resulting damage.
sentences.cn: 空气防止了催化式排气净化器的过载及可能产生的损坏.

sentences.en: The bus was overloaded with tourists and their luggage.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车载着满满的游客和行李。

sentences.en: There is an incurable tendency in the human mind to overload things with personal significance.
sentences.cn: 人类的天性中有一种无法克服的倾向,就是要使每件东西都担负上私人的意义.

sentences.en: There is an internal circuit breaker to protect the instrument from overload.
sentences.cn: 内置有断路器，防止设备过载。

sentences.en: Thus the ability to withstand overload is a very desirable quality in engineering materials.
sentences.cn: 因此,承受过载的能力是工程材料一种非常需要的性能.

sentences.en: Whenever famous actresses get together to make a "woman's film" you can bet on an overload of sentimental mush.
sentences.cn: 无论什么时候，只要知名女演员们聚在一起，去演绎一部“女性题材电影”，那毫无疑问里面准是一堆多愁善感的故事。

phrases.tran_cn: 信息过载；信息超载；信息超负荷
过载保护器；超负荷保险装置
过载继电器；超载替续器
热继电器；热过载继电器

trans.tran_en: to put too many things or people on or into something

trans.tran_cn: 使负担太重，使超载，超过负荷
trans.tran_en: to put too many things or people on or into something
